author: Brandon Choo
comment: This app would be perfect for me if I can manually key in the reference frequencies as I play in a bagpipe band and sometimes need to tune the bass and tebor drums to the frequencies of the bagpipes which ranges between 480 to 495 depending on the weather. Otherwise, this is a fantastic app whenever I need to tune my guitar!

author: Phil Mayers
comment: I use this regularly when I'm teaching guitar or gigging. It just needs an auto off as I forget to switch it off sometimes and it completely drains my battery

author: Claire Sanderson
comment: Beautiful and simple tuner, for both watch and phone.
title: Great app

author: Sean Taubner
comment: Works good on both watch and phone.

reply.author: Acorn Technology
reply.content: The greying out is only a cosmetic thing. I believe the problem has been the trigger level (sensitivity). The new version let's you adjust this level. Default is currently 15db. Can you see if the new version works better now? Thanks! Chris.

author: Oscar Asterkrans
comment: Beautiful design
title: Works great!

author: Don Wells
comment: I use this on my Moto 360. Works as well as my Korg tuner. Using it to tune my violin.
title: Works great

author: Mike Nightingale
comment: Great app! Even though I have many tuners this one is always on my wrist and ready to go! I would like to suggest an improvement - Presets for various instruments, such as Guitar, Violin/Mandolin, Ukulele, Bass Guitar, 5 string Banjo, etc And perhaps some of the more common Alternate guitar tunings? This would get a 5 star rating for me!  :)

author: Sergio Serratos
comment: Works great!

author: shmahat ma
comment: This makes me future man now. Yes.... Just yes.

author: Paul Field
comment: No need to grab your phone!
title: Works really well

author: Oscar South
comment: Very impressive!
title: Responsive and accurate on wear

author: Hasan Barakat
comment: Great!
title: Great!

author: Anthony Dunk
comment: I installed it in on my Sony smartwatch 3 and its works great using inbuilt microphone. No need to find my phone when I need a guitar tuned now. Thanks
title: Works great

comment: Works great on my moto 360 while I am wearing it on my wrist, couldn't ask for anything better
title: Works Wonderfully

author: Kristian Sommer
comment: and functional! oh btw, do you think you could maybe add a metronome into it? it would be absolutely fantastic if it was possible :) well done on the design too! it's an eye candy
title: That's just so cool!

author: Michael Doppler
comment: However forgetting it's open on the watch really drains battery. If there could be an option to let the screen turn back off, that'd be great.

reply.author: Acorn Technology
reply.content: We'll add a ticket for that!

title: Just what I was looking for

author: Keith Liggins
comment: The app has difficulty tuning F#0 and B0.
title: 7-string bass

author: Asif Moosa
comment: Works great. Could please add a vibrating metronome? That would make it perfect!

reply.author: Acorn Technology
reply.content: We'll add it to our idea list. :)

title: Cool

author: Ian Boys
comment: This is simply the best tuner I have ever had that was not a Korg. It is responsive, easy to use, and is incredibly convenient. Great, great app!
title: Perfect!

author: Bojan Gutic
comment: Incredibly accurate on my moto360. I love it!
title: Whoah

author: Gil R
comment: Thanks
title: Just works

author: Nate Steckel
comment: Would love to see a metronome added.
title: Awesome app

author: Sean O'Neill
comment: Just got done using this app for the first time.  This runs great.  It would be awesome to have a version optimized for the LGGWR screen.
title: New favorite android wear app

comment: Brilliant!

author: Aaron Willis
comment: This is great in so many ways, for so many reason. Thanks for making a tuner that's always strapped to my wrist.  I also got really good results in a noisy room by pressing the watch bezel (gently) against the neck to get a reading, and then dialing it in. Not as quick, but it worked. Also, as the noise died down, it seems like the vibration from the tuning peg transferring through my fingers were helping it. I'm sure this is stuff that you know, but still pretty neat.  Well worth a hard earned dollar!

reply.author: Acorn Technology
reply.content: Nope, didn't think about the neck trick! Thanks!

title: Wow. A great tuner, always with you.

author: Håkan Berggren
comment: Quick response, nice looking interface, easy to use. Managed to tune my guitar in less than a minute. Can really recommend it!
title: Finally, a tuner that works great!

author: Chris Fogelklou
comment: Really simple interface, but it works great on my LG GWatch.
title: Simple but it works!
